EmailTemplate.subject: Automation and the Flight Envelope
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Use access code 850409 to watch now.
Did you miss our webinar on March 26th? If so, we have it recorded for you
SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic and builder, along with Andrew Barker and Mariellen Couppee from BendixKing, explore the subject of levels of automation, visual cues and strategies for aligning your aircraftâ€™s automation with phases of flight.
Topics included:
- Automation and the Envelope - Overview and Differences - The Mindset of the Box - Walk-through Scenarios
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, any webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner. WATCH THE WEBINAR HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Automation_and_the_Flight_Envelope.html]]>
